## Introduction

We explore the `gapminder` dataset that is available from the `gapminder` R package. The dataset has `r nrow(gapminder)` observations and has `r ncol(gapminder)` variables including

* country
* continent
* year
* life expectancy at birth
* total population
* per-capita GDP (in units of international dollars)
